page.title: 12PIGEONS
page.content: I have been racing pigeons for two years but have worked with them for nine.I am a member of the Pigeon Fanciers Club in Alnwick.Every Friday night I take my birds down to the Blue Bell Pub which is where the club is based.In all,I have 100 birds. Around January I put a cock bird with a hen bird. Three weeks later two white eggs will have been laid at an interval of one day .These eggs are nearly always a cock and a hen bird.The chicks are born featherless and yellow.After 1_2 weeks the young are getting their feathers and arpund this time they are ringed on any leg. And one month old they can fly .My birds race all over Britain.
